item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Patricia Briggs
item.description:
"Adam swore harshly. "New werewolves are dangerous, woman. Especially when they are cold and hungry." He looked at Mac, and his voice changed completely, the heat and anger gone, "Mercy, come here."
I didn't look down to see what he'd noticed in Mac's face. I took a step, but Mac was wrapped around my left leg. I stopped before I fell. "Uhm. I'm a little stuck for the moment." -- Patricia Briggs

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Yes, they are elves," Legolas said. "and they say that you breathe so loud they could shoot you in the dark." Sam hastily covered his mouth." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "No speech is ever considered, but only the speaker. It's so much easier to pass judgement on a man than on an idea." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Beauty is bought by judgement of the eye." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Lloyd Alexander
item.description: "But, alas, in most of us good and bad are closely woven as the threads on a loom; greater wisdom than mine is needed for the judging." -- Lloyd Alexander

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Gordon Livingston
item.description: "If the map doesn't agree with the ground the map is wrong" -- Gordon Livingston

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Dr. Amit Abraham
item.description: "Man is what he believes – believe in yourself" -- Dr. Amit Abraham

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Dianna Hardy
item.description: "Then, things get hard, because once you know magic exists, you have to decide whether to be the bystander, or the magician … and we were all born to be magicians." -- Dianna Hardy

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Lailah Gifty Akita
item.description: "There is hero in everyone. Never doubt who you are." -- Lailah Gifty Akita
